name: Reverse me
description:
Reverse me! This was created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

Goal: Save Cassie! The idea it's that you don't get rewinded more than 4 times because if you do the songs on the tape will be overriden and the level will be restarted.

CONTROLS:

  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Z: Rewind
  • X: Record position.
  • Escape: Go back to level selector.
  • C or Space: Continue dialogue
  • You can also click on the tape icons to listen to your own music on the game!

Finish the game before the time ends and before you run out of rewinds.

Info about the music:

All the music that comes with the game is made by me.
